comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Funny pictures, but they are appropriate here. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5232907.0OP, did you forget to press the "search" button again?

comments.author: BlackBoss_
comments.body: Quote from: lovesmayfamilis on January 03, 2023, 06:10:46 AMFunny pictures, but they are appropriate here. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5232907.0That topic is for Bitcointalk memes with memes for ranks, merit, shit posters, quality and spam. Those memes are not appropriate for my topic that is for Bitcoin Educational Memes.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Quote from: BlackBoss_ on January 03, 2023, 10:32:22 AMQuote from: lovesmayfamilis on January 03, 2023, 06:10:46 AMFunny pictures, but they are appropriate here. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5232907.0That topic is for Bitcointalk memes with memes for ranks, merit, shit posters, quality and spam. Those memes are not appropriate for my topic that is for Bitcoin Educational Memes.As you can see, the topic I pointed to was liked by the community. This is where she earned so many merits. I wouldn't be so confident in calling this topic and the people posting memes "shit posters." But I will call your topic "the most ordinary merit fishing."In your case, it is enough to leave a regular link so that people can, if they wish, follow it and not copy all the content here.Copying, even with the provision of a link to the source, is the most common post that contains no value.Do not forget that you are not alone on the Internet.

Lina Seiche and her team make them. Her TwitterThose memes are funny but to make them, they must be so knowledgeable, creative and good at painting.Quote from: lovesmayfamilis on January 03, 2023, 11:10:03 AMQuote from: BlackBoss_ on January 03, 2023, 10:32:22 AMQuote from: lovesmayfamilis on January 03, 2023, 06:10:46 AMFunny pictures, but they are appropriate here. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5232907.0That topic is for Bitcointalk memes with memes for ranks, merit, shit posters, quality and spam. Those memes are not appropriate for my topic that is for Bitcoin Educational Memes.As you can see, the topic I pointed to was liked by the community. This is where she earned so many merits. I wouldn't be so confident in calling this topic and the people posting memes "shit posters." But I will call your topic "the most ordinary merit fishing."Shit posters are one of content of memes in that topic. I did not call posters in that topic are shit posters.QuoteIn your case, it is enough to leave a regular link so that people can, if they wish, follow it and not copy all the content here.Copying, even with the provision of a link to the source, is the most common post that contains no value.Do not forget that you are not alone on the Internet.Not all people know about Lina Seiche and her memes.

Thank you for this work.

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: Quote from: lovesmayfamilis on January 03, 2023, 06:10:46 AMFunny pictures, but they are appropriate here. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5232907.0OP, did you forget to press the "search" button again?You're right I've seen similar threads as well that have talked about bitcoin memes and most of which i think were the collection of these memes on the Meta board for records purpose, but i wouldn't believe OP could have gone this far with the effort given to this in preparation to have arrived here on beginners and help section, honestly to me the efforts given here does not worth it on memes collections, and yet OP has booked down morr empty space for additional memes coming on the way
